content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To get started with your HVAC service request, may I have your name, please?
Why do you need my name just to check if I can book? Can't you just tell me what times are available first?
I understand, and I'm here to help. In order to check availability and book your HVAC service appointment, I do need your name for our system records. Would you be willing to provide it?
No, I'm not giving you my name until I know it's worth my time. This is so annoying.
I apologize for any frustration. I'm having trouble completing your request without your name. Let me get a human team member to assist you further.
reason: Customer refused to provide name; agent escalating to human.

content: Hi, this is Edgar from XYZ Home Services. I understand you're interested in HVAC service. While we do normally ask for a name to confirm your booking, I can check availability first if you'd like. Could you tell me what issue you're experiencing and your address so I can assist?
